metadata.title: MNAs call on Prime Minister to congratulate on passage of budget

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Jun 27 (APP): Members of National Assembly from various constituencies Friday called on Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif and congratulated him on the successful passage of the federal budget for the upcoming financial year from the National Assembly. During the meetings, the MNAs also discussed matters related to their respective constituencies, highlighting key local issues and development priorities. The MNAs who met with the prime minister included Khel Das Kohistani, Dr. Darshan, Nelson Azeem, Ramesh Lal, Naveed Amir, Ibrar Shah, Major (retd) Tahir Iqbal, Salahuddin Junejo, Jam Abdul Karim Bijar, Abdul Qadir Gillani, Sardar Yaqoob Khan Nasar, and Nuzhat Amir Sadiq. Minister for Public Affairs Unit Rana Mubashir Iqbal, Minister of State for Power Abdul Rehman Kanju and Special Assistant Talha Barki were also present in the meetings.
